definition: Li Si, name for an unspecified person, second of a series of three: 張三|张三[Zhang1 San1], 李四, 王五[Wang2 Wu3] Tom, Dick and Harry
Li Siguang (1889-1971), Mongol-born, Japanese trained geologist, prominent in early PRC oil exploration
Zhang the Third and Li the Fourth (idiom)/Tom, Dick and Harry
four proverbial names/Tom, Dick and Harry
pinyin: Zhang1 san1 , Li3 si4 , Wang2 wu3 , Zhao4 liu4

sentences.english: He told his troubles to every Tom, Dick and Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他見人就訴說自己的煩惱，不論張三，抑或李四。

sentences.english: We rank Li Siguang as a great scientist.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲李四光是個偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: Li Siguang is a famous geographer.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是一位著名的地理學家。

sentences.english: Is Bill fully morally responsible for his actions?
sentences.chinese: 那李四要對他的行爲負上完全的道義責任嗎？

sentences.english: Li Siguang was a brilliant scientist.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是一位卓越的科學家。

sentences.english: He wants to be as great a scientist as Li Siguang.
sentences.chinese: 他想成爲和李四光一樣的偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: I haven't replied, Li Si walked to come in again and took a name card in hand.
sentences.chinese: 我還沒有答覆，李四又走了進來，手裏拿着一張名片。

sentences.english: But in another way it makes perfect sense to hold Bill fully accountable for murder.
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面，讓李四對謀殺付全責是完全合理的。

sentences.english: Jhon ate rice at canteen and Tom ate noodles at home.
sentences.chinese: 張三在食堂喫飯，李四在家裏吃麪。

sentences.english: Li Siguang is the greatest scientist that ever lived.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是古今最偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: Hey, Sally, what did you think about the sales meeting last week?
sentences.chinese: 張三，李四，王二，你們對上週的銷售會議怎麼看？

sentences.english: And to kill John Doe and the proprietress .
Zhang San sent Li Si a book.
Li si to rob SunSan body, be Friday stun forced away.
sentences.chinese: 李四要去搶孫三的屍體，被週五打暈強行帶走。

sentences.english: Jhon ate rice at canteen and Tom noodles at home…
sentences.chinese: 張三在食堂喫飯，李四在家裏吃麪。

sentences.english: Suppose that Mark and Bill live in a deterministic universe.
sentences.chinese: 假設張三和李四生活在一個宿命式的世界裏。

definition: John Doe/Zhang San, name for an unspecified person, first of a series of three: 張三|张三, 李四[Li3 Si4], 王五[Wang2 Wu3] Tom, Dick and Harry
Wang Wu, name for an unspecified person, third of a series of three: 張三|张三[Zhang1 San1], 李四[Li3 Si4], 王五 Tom, Dick and Harry
Zhang the Third and Li the Fourth (idiom)/Tom, Dick and Harry
Zhang Bao (-184), leader of the Yellow Turban rebels during the late Han 漢朝|汉朝[Han4 chao2]
Wu Yong, character of 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], nicknamed Resourceful Star 智多星[Zhi4 duo1 xing1]
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
